Package com.example.assignment1_part3.model

Class StudentContainer

java.lang.Object
com.example.assignment1_part3.model.StudentContainer
public class StudentContainer extends Object
This class is responsible for all logic related to the database

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentContainer

      public StudentContainer(Connection connection)

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      public boolean addStudent(Student student)
      This method receives a student object and then uses a sql statement to add the student to the students table in the database. It converts the data to be compatible with mySQL dates.
      Parameters:
      student - - the student to be added to the database
      Returns:
      - a boolean value, true if the student was added to the students table and false if not

    • removeStudent

      public boolean removeStudent(String studentNum)
      This method uses a mySQL statement which looks for an entry with a matching studentNum and then deletes it.
      Parameters:
      studentNum - - id of the student to be deleted
      Returns:
      - a boolean value, true if the student has been successfully deleted from the database, false if not

    • getStudents

      public String getStudents()
      This method gets the information on all the students in the database and adds the details to a string. This is used to fill the textArea in tab 1.
      Returns:
      - the string value of all the student records in the database

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent(String studentNum) throws SQLException
      This method finds the details of a specified student in the database and creates an object of the student which is returned.
      Parameters:
      studentNum - - the id of the student whose details are wanted
      Returns:
      - the student object
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getStudentIDs

      public ArrayList<String> getStudentIDs()
      This method gets all the students in the database and then gets selects their ids to add them to a string
      Returns:
      - the string of all the student ids

    • getModuleCodes

      public ArrayList<String> getModuleCodes()
      This method gets all the modules from the database and then selects their codes to add to a string
      Returns:
      - a string of all the modules codes

    • studentInTable

      public boolean studentInTable(String studentNum) throws SQLException
      This method receives a student number and then creates a sql statement to see if the student number exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      studentNum - - the number of the student to be checked
      Returns:
      - a boolean value, true if the student number exists in the table, false if it doesn't
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • moduleInTable

      public boolean moduleInTable(String moduleCode) throws SQLException
      This method checks if a specified module already exists in the database
      Parameters:
      moduleCode - - the module code to be compared against the database
      Returns:
      - a boolean, true if the value exists, false if it doesn't
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • addModule

      public boolean addModule(Module myModule)
      This method adds a module to the module table in the database
      Parameters:
      myModule - - the module to be added to the database
      Returns:
      - true if the module is successfully added, false otherwise

    • removeModule

      public boolean removeModule(String code)
      This module removes a record from the modules table in the database.
      Parameters:
      code - - the id of the module to be deleted
      Returns:
      - true if the record is deleted, false if otherwise

    • submitGrade

      public boolean submitGrade(String studentNum, String moduleNum, String grade)
      This method enters a record into the grades table in the database.
      Parameters:
      studentNum - - the id of the student to be added to the studentNum field of the table
      moduleNum - - the id of the module to be added to the moduleID field of the table
      grade - - the grade to be entered to the grade field in the table
      Returns:
      - true if the record was successfully added to the database, false if not

    • getGradeInfo

      public String getGradeInfo(String studentNum)
      This method gets the grade information for a specific student from the database. If the grade is above 40 (a pass) then it is appended to a string
      Parameters:
      studentNum - - the id of the student whose grades are requested
      Returns:
      - a string containing the student's grade information

    • updateStudentGrade

      public boolean updateStudentGrade(String studentId, String moduleCode, String grade) throws SQLException
      This method updates the grade in the grades table to the grade passed into the method.
      Parameters:
      studentId - - id of student whose grade is to be changed
      moduleCode - - id of the module with the grade to be changed
      grade - - the new grade
      Returns:
      - true if the record has be updated successfully, false if not
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • gradeInTable

      public boolean gradeInTable(String studentNum, String moduleCode) throws SQLException
      This method finds out if a particular record of a grade exists in the grades table
      Parameters:
      studentNum - - the id of the student whose grade we are checking for
      moduleCode - - the id of the module which has the grade we are looking for
      Returns:
      - true if the record exists, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getStudentModuleInfo

      public List<String> getStudentModuleInfo(String studentNum) throws SQLException
      This method joins two mySQL tables, grades and modules, to get the moduleID for a particular student and the grade they received in it. It then adds this information to a string List.
      Parameters:
      studentNum - - the id of the student whose module and grade info we are trying to find
      Returns:
      - a List containing the moduleIDs and grades received
      Throws:
      SQLException
